title: (x) Blue Giraffee Sans-Serif - Trebuchet Bold {R}
content:
Can someone help identify the typeface in this logo?  
Many thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018223338im_/http:/typophile.com/files/7a1b74e5b1128e7084e00ad63e2ccc18_6296.png)
author: sarahcazee

comments.content: This is Vincent Connare’s [Trebuchet Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018223338/http:/www.ascenderfonts.com/font/trebuchet-family.aspx). It comes with some operating systems, so have a look into your font folder before buying anything.
Thanks thanks! I'm a little embarrassed. Shoulda known that one.
